body:
Your comment at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4353#issuecomment-354020524 was extremely enlightening, and I think we should put it somewhere in the source code. Would you be willing to move this into a Note at the top of `test_distributions.py`, and then reference this note wherever we are explicitly calling `set_rng_seed`? Something like:

```
Note [Randomized statistical tests]
--------------
...
```

and then 

```
set_rng_seed(1)  # see Note [Randomized statistical tests]
```
